QuestData.Title: Marks of Sargeras
QuestData.Description: By now it should be clear to you why we oppose the Burning Legion and those who serve them.$B$BIf you wish to prove yourself to the Aldor, bring me the insignias of high-ranking Legion and their Shadow Council followers. Here in Shadowmoon you will find a strong Legion presence to the far west in Legion Hold and the Deathforge.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring 10 Marks of Sargeras to Harbinger Saronen in Shadowmoon Valley.$B$BCompleting quests for the Aldor will cause your Scryers reputation level to decrease.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you bear any of our enemies' insignias, $N?
QuestData.RewardText: Your courage is strong, friend. Let it be known to all that you are a true ally of the priesthood!
